languages.text: Устройство, странным образом похожее одновременно на когитатор и кузнечный горн, реагирует на ваше присутствие бледным миганием огней и непонятным двоичным сигналом.

traits.locale_text: Устройство, странным образом похожее одновременно на когитатор и кузнечный горн, реагирует на ваше присутствие бледным миганием огней и непонятным двоичным сигналом.

languages.text: The device, which bears an odd resemblance to both a cogitator and a furnace, reacts to your presence with a faint blink of its lights and an inscrutable binharic signal.
languages.original_text: Устройство, странным образом похожее одновременно на когитатор и кузнечный горн, реагирует на ваше присутствие бледным миганием огней и непонятным двоичным сигналом.

traits.locale_text: The device that bears an odd resemblance to both a cogitator and a furnace reacts to your presence with a faint blink of its lights and an inscrutable binharic signal.
The device that bears an odd resemblance to both a cogitator and a furnace reacts to your presence with a faint blink of its lights and an inscrutable binharic signal.
The device, which bears an odd resemblance to both a cogitator and a furnace, reacts to your presence with a faint blink of its lights and an inscrutable binharic signal.
The device, which bears an odd resemblance to both a cogitator and a furnace, reacts to your presence with a faint blink of its lights and an inscrutable binharic signal.
The device, which bears an odd resemblance to both a cogitator and a furnace, reacts to your presence with a faint blink of its lights and an inscrutable binharic signal.

languages.text: その装置はなぜか考算機と炉の両方に奇妙な類似性を持っており、あなたの存在に微かな点滅と理解不能なビンハリック信号で反応した。
languages.original_text: The device, which bears an odd resemblance to both a cogitator and a furnace, reacts to your presence with a faint blink of its lights and an inscrutable binharic signal.

traits.locale_text: その装置はなぜか考算機と炉の両方に奇妙な類似性を持っており、あなたの存在に微かな点滅と理解不能なビンハリック信号で反応した。

languages.text: L'étrange appareil, qui évoque à la fois un cogitateur et un fourneau, réagit à votre présence en clignotant faiblement et en vous adressant un signal en binhaire incompréhensible.
languages.original_text: The device, which bears an odd resemblance to both a cogitator and a furnace, reacts to your presence with a faint blink of its lights and an inscrutable binharic signal.

traits.locale_text: L'étrange appareil, qui évoque à la fois un cogitateur et un fourneau, réagit à votre présence en clignotant faiblement et en vous adressant un signal en binhaire incompréhensible.

languages.text: 这个装置看起来既像是某种沉思者，又像是某种熔炉。它对你的出现做出了反应，灯光微弱地闪了一下，发出了难以捉摸的二进制信号。
languages.original_text: The device, which bears an odd resemblance to both a cogitator and a furnace, reacts to your presence with a faint blink of its lights and an inscrutable binharic signal.

traits.locale_text: 这个装置看起来既像是某种思考器，又像是某种熔炉。它对你的出现做出了反应，灯光微弱地闪了一下，发出了难以捉摸的二进制信号。

languages.text: El aparato, a caballo entre un cogitador y un horno, reacciona a tu presencia con un sutil parpadeo y una señal binaria inescrutable.
languages.original_text: The device, which bears an odd resemblance to both a cogitator and a furnace, reacts to your presence with a faint blink of its lights and an inscrutable binharic signal.

traits.locale_text: El aparato, a caballo entre un cogitador y un horno, reacciona a tu presencia con un sutil parpadeo y una señal binaria inescrutable.

languages.text: Das Gerät, das auf eigenartige Weise sowohl einem Cogitator als auch einem Ofen ähnelt, reagiert mit einem schwachen Flackern seiner Lichter auf deine Anwesenheit. Außerdem stößt es ein unverständliches binhäres Signal aus.
languages.original_text: The device, which bears an odd resemblance to both a cogitator and a furnace, reacts to your presence with a faint blink of its lights and an inscrutable binharic signal.

traits.locale_text: Das Gerät, das auf eigenartige Weise sowohl einem Cogitator als auch einem Ofen ähnelt, reagiert mit einem schwachen Flackern seiner Lichter auf deine Anwesenheit. Außerdem stößt es ein unverständliches binhäres Signal aus.

languages.text: Tuhaf bir şekilde hem kavramsayarı hem de fırını andıran cihaz, bir an için ışıklarını biraz karartıp anlaşılmayan bir ikilidil sinyali vererek seni karşılıyor.
languages.original_text: The device, which bears an odd resemblance to both a cogitator and a furnace, reacts to your presence with a faint blink of its lights and an inscrutable binharic signal.

traits.locale_text: Tuhaf bir şekilde hem kavramsayarı hem de fırını andıran cihaz, bir an için ışıklarını biraz karartıp anlaşılmayan bir ikilidil sinyali vererek seni karşılıyor.
